job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by…
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
       Examples of desirable expertise
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by…
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
       Examples of desirable expertise

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to generate code and evaluating that code, rather than on building, training, or deploying AI models. It emphasizes 'human feedback' and 'training AI models' through crafting and answering questions, which aligns more with using AI tools for productivity enhancement or data annotation rather than a core AI engineering role. There is no mention of core AI engineering tasks like model development, fine-tuning, MLOps, or building AI-powered applications.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'help train AI models' directly relates to the process of creating or adapting machine learning models, even if the role is focused on providing feedback for training rather than direct model building.
The phrase 'Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models' describes a task that directly contributes to the training data or process for AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models' involves assessing the output of AI models, which is a form of feedback loop that can be used for model improvement or training.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'experienced software engineer' and 'lend your coding expertise', indicating a need for software development skills, although the application of these skills is for training AI rather than building user-facing applications.
The phrase 'talented coders' implies a requirement for software development skills.

soft_skills.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
